text: Mazima twatuma ababaka oluberyeberye lwo, mu bo mulimu betwakunyumizaako, era mu bo mulimu betutakunyumizaako, era Nabbi yenna yali tayinza kuleeta kya magero okugyako nga Katonda yasazeewo, kale nno ekigambo kya Katonda bwekirijja ensonga zirilamulwa mu mazima, era awo abonoonyi webalifafaganirwa
